summary: In 2001 a mass grave was discovered in a suburb of Belgrade. Soon there were more to come. "Depth Two" investigates the hidden story behind this horrid discovery and takes us back to 1999 and the NATO bombings in Serbia.
cast: Bosko Radojkovic|Caslav Golubovic|Bozidar Protic|Shyhrete Berisha|Marko Minic|Obrad Stevanovic
title: Dubina dva
